Html:
Hi there
I would like to try this tool but also I am interested in how to extend/combine the given branch plans. Is there a guide/tutorial on how to edit the *.branchplan files?
Which tool is used to create branch plan images in (AppData)\Local\Microsoft\VisualStudio\11.0\Extensions.\Branch Plans\Basic?

There are links to videos and blog posts in TOC â€“ Quick Response Solutions that take you through the process of customising an existing plan or adding a new one. The images for all the branch plans are in the guidance downloads in a PowerPoint file.
Willy, I think there is something wrong with the TOC link you posted. It goes to www.example.com
Thanks, the editor replaces the URL when you use the URL token ... fixed and will be more careful next time :)
